meanings: (소리치다) cry (out), shout (out), yell (out), scream (out), shriek, exclaim

vlive.korean: [혹은 만장일치로 외쳤던] 뭐야 여기 근데? 이게 뭐야? [Or, they want him unanimously] What's this place? What's this? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
vlive.english: [Or, they want him unanimously] What's this place? What's this?

vlive.korean: [꾸준히 외쳤던 이름] 지민이 어디 있어요? [Always trying to find Jimin] Where is he? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: [Always trying to find Jimin] Where is he?

vlive.korean: 첫 시작부터 외쳤던 기린이를 만났다. I saw the giraffe that I was shouting for from the start. 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : 아프리카에서 진짜 사파리투어! [트러블러 X 효니 아프리카 TV] EP02 만남
vlive.english: I saw the giraffe that I was shouting for from the start.

vlive.korean: [정말 신나게 혼자 구호를 외쳤던 지민] 156 156 156 156 1! [Jimin was very excited] 156 156 156 156, 1! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.71
그렇게 막내가 외치고 외쳤던 꽃피는 봄이 오잖아요? So the spring that blooms flowers that the youngest has been singing about is here, right? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 지쎈왔다🐳
vlive.english: So the spring that blooms flowers that the youngest has been singing about is here, right?

examples.korean: shrill demands / protests 발음듣기 소리 높이 외치는[날카로운] 요구/항의 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
She cried out his name. 발음듣기 그녀가 그의 이름을 외쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She cried out his name. 발음

examples.korean: The crowd yelled encouragement at the players. 발음듣기 관중들이 선수들을 향해 힘내라고 외쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The crowd yelled encouragement at the players. 발음

examples.korean: ‘See you later!’ she called. 발음듣기 “나중에 봐!” 그녀가 외쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
‘Help!’ he cried out. 발음듣기 “도와 줘요!” 그가 외쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
